name: videocontext
description: A WebGL & HTML5 graph based video composition library

scripts.build: npm run test && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run doc
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run test-unit
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --new-version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --new-version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version --new-version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
